content.question:
Sed non ante datur telluris operta subire

auricomos quam qui decerpserit arbore fetus.1

Hoc sibi pulchra suum ferri Proserpina munus

instituit.

1fetus, -us, m.: fruit, product

1. (a) Who is the speaker of these lines?

(b) Who is the addressee?

frqParts.text:
Sed non ante datur telluris operta subire

auricomos quam qui decerpserit arbore fetus.1

Hoc sibi pulchra suum ferri Proserpina munus

instituit.

1fetus, -us, m.: fruit, product

1. (a) Who is the speaker of these lines?

(b) Who is the addressee?
2. To what does munus (line 3) refer? What will it be used for?

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
